column5: ユナ：あっ！亜耶乎ちゃん…
ユナ：亜耶乎ちゃん！よかった！
ポリリーナ：さぁ、発進よ
ユナ：こうして、地球を守るため、あたし達は旅立った
column6: And so we set out on a journey in order to protect the Earth.

column5: 地球のみんな、待っててね！
column6: People of Earth, wait for us!

column5: ミサキ：闇の力が開放されていく
column6: The power of darkness is being released.

column5: 玉鷲：まだ私を姉と呼んでくれるか…
玉鷲：私はお前に憧れていた…
誰からも愛され慕われてきたお前に…
column6: You, who were loved and admired by everyone...

column5: だがいつしか、その気持ちが嫉妬に変わり、このような事に…
column6: But before I knew it, that feeling turned to jealousy, and so things turned to this...

column5: 全て[を?][己??]の弱い心に負けた、私の責任なのだ…
column6: I, who lost everything to my own weak heart, am responsible.

column5: これが私に出来るせめてもの罪滅ぼしだ
column6: This is the only atonement I can make.

column5: でも、何者にも負けない強い力を持っているのですね
column6: But they hold a power that no one can defeat, don't they?

column5: ポリリーナ：誰の心にも、闇は潜んでいく
column6: In every person's heart, darkness lurks.

column5: 玉華：ありがとう、ユナさん
姉上に、玉鷲を信じてくれて
(background dialogue by yuna and yuri plays here, but some of it is drowned out by the narration:)
ユナ：うん！絶対に来るよ！
玉華さんもみんなと遊びに来て、あたしが色んなとこ案内したげるから！
column6: Miss Yui Hua, you come and have fun with all of us too!
I'll show you around all the sights!

column5: ハンバーガー屋さんにアイスクリーム屋さんに、お蕎麦屋さんと御田屋さんも！
column6: The hamburger and ice cream shops, and the soba and oden vendors too!

column5: ユナ：食べ物屋さんばっかりじゃないの！
column6: Hey, that's nothing but food joints!

column5: 楽しみにしていますよ、ユナさん
column6: I'll be looking forward to it, Madam Yuna.

column5: ポリリーナ：さぁ、帰りましょう？

column6:
— Lady Erika!\n
— And Ako and Mako, too!

column5: ユナ：アコちゃん、マコちゃんも！
ど、どうしちゃったの、エリカちゃん！？
白香：皆さん、逃げて下さい！
column6: All of you, please run away!

column5: 白香：この人たちが、操られています！
美鬼：ホホホホ、オホホホホ、オホホホホホ…

column6: If you don't, it'll be you too!

column5: 美鬼：ホホホホ、オホホホホホ…

column6: No! Don't let go of my hand!

column5: ポリリーナ：ユナ、後は任せたわ！
column6: Yuna, the rest is up to you!
It's fine. This should be a piece of cake, right!?

column5: [簡単にいく場合?]じゃないわよ！
column7: CHECK, difficult to make out over the background noise and music

column5: 舞：負けたら承知しないからねえぇぇぇ…！
column6: If you lose, I'll never forgive youuuuu...!

column5: ユナ：舞ちゃああん！ポリリーナ様…！
美鬼：ホホホホ、オホホホホ、オホホホホホ…

column6: Legend of the Galaxy Fraulein Yuna
hohoemi wa kurayami no naka de

column5: 勇気を照らす光になる
column6: yuuki o terasu hikari ni naru
makes a light that shines on courage

column5: 微笑みは哀しみを消して
七色の虹を心に架ける
column6: nanairo no niji o kokoro ni kakeru
and links a seven-colored rainbow to the heart

column5: たとえば夜空を駆け抜けて行く
column7: NOTE: the furigana in the saturn manual claim 行く is read as "iku" here, but the vocal is clearly "yuku"

column6: If, sweeping through the night sky

column5: 小さな星屑　夢のかけらなら
column6: chiisana hoshikuzu yume no kakera nara
all the tiny stars are fragments of dreams

column5: 今ぐす受け止めに行くわ
column6: ima sugu uketome ni iku wa
I'll go to catch them right away

column5: 涙に変わらないように

column6: so they might not turn to tears

column5: このまま見失ってしまう前に
column6: kono mama miushinatte shimau mae ni
before, doing nothing, I lose sight of them

column5: 私ならいつもここにいる
column6: watashi nara itsumo koko ni iru

column5: 一番近くで見つめてる
私にはみんな分かってる
column7: NOTE: there's a reasonable argument for "minna" to mean "everything" here. personally, i interpret it as tying into the "anata" in the following line and hence being "everyone/all [of you]".

column5: あなたの笑顔を待ってる

column6: hohoemi wa kurayami no naka de

column5: 勇気を照らす光になる
column6: yuuki o terasu hikari ni naru
makes a light that shines on courage

column5: 微笑みは哀しみを消して
七色の虹を心に架ける
column6: nanairo no niji o kokoro ni kakeru
and links a seven-colored rainbow to the heart

column5: ユナ：みんな…いなくなちゃった…
プリンセス号！？プリンセス・ミラージュ！？
我[の意にそぐわぬ??に代わり??身代わり??]、銀河に破壊と混沌[を?]！
column6: Destruction and chaos upon the galaxy that suits not my will!
column7: FIXME, the first part of the sentence is sufficiently drowned out by all the dramatic background noise that i can't make it out. に代わり is at least somewhat plausible, but it doesn't feel right to me. i can't come up with anything more sensible, though. maybe の意にそぐわぬ, a line she uses later, but that requires a lot of inaudibly mumbled syllables...ugh, but it's the least worst of the possibilities i can come up with. let's go with that, i guess.

column5: 全ての生きとし生ける物よ、我に絶対の[服従?復讐?][を?]！
column6:
All living beings of the universe!\n
Absolute obedience to me!

column5: 我は機械化皇帝！全知全能なる銀河の支配者！

column6: The omniscient and omnipresent ruler of the galaxy!
Guys! Hurry, get them to the ship!

column5: ユナ：だって怪我してるんだもん
幻夢：フフ…光の…救世主か…

column7: CHECK, this is a whisper against a great deal of background noise that makes it very hard to make out. i'm dubious that it's actually ここまでか (a line kyouka uses earlier in the game), but can't come up with anything better. and even if it IS correct it's a very vague phrase that could mean any number of things in this context ("the emperor would go so far as to kill us", "how could we be attacked even here", "after we made it so far, this is what's happening"...)

column5: ユーリィ：亜耶乎ちゃん…

column7: NOTE: this honestly sounds like it could just be an emotive grunt to me. other people seem pretty convinced it's 来る, though, and there does seem to be a second syllable to it, so i guess i'll go with that.
NOTE: the fact that yuri's shout can be picked out from the others by the trailing "desuuuuu" that keeps going after everyone else has finished greatly amuses me

column5: ユナ：ライトアップ！エルライン！
column7: NOTE: oh, so THIS is what they were saying during the transformation sequence in yuna 2. i couldn't understand it at all because they had five people shouting it at once, with pretty poor synchronization. (i'll never claim to be perfect, but c'mon, those are trying circumstances. please ignore the fact that i could easily have looked it up at any time if i'd actually tried to do so.) hmm, should probably fix that...and miki's beauty and the beast reference that i missed...and probably a bunch of other things...
